mapper.select: SELECT v.userNickname, v.targetNickname, v.content, v.create_date, DATE_FORMAT(v.update_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') as update_date, us.contentPath, u.userName FROM visit v INNER JOIN userStorage us ON v.userNickname = us.userNickname INNER JOIN user u ON us.userNickname = u.userNickname WHERE v.targetNickname = #{targetNickname} AND us.allocation = 1 ORDER BY v.update_date DESC
